Name: Big Hit VR Baseball
About the game: Big Hit VR Baseball is a pick-up-and-play mix of accurate baseball simulation and arcade-y action. Do you have what it takes to hit a big league fastball? Step up to the plate! Key Features Baseballs move using the real physics of baseball, including spin Face off against Fastballs , Sinkers , Curveballs , Changeups , Sliders , and Cutters Hone your swing in Batting Practice or go for the fences in Home Run Contest . More batting challenges coming soon. Fun for any age or ability : Increase the baseball size, slow it down, or juice it to hit massive home runs!
